name: Quest Certification (P) Ltd.
overview:
We are one of the leading accredited certification body in India, providing ISO certifications for various standards like ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 18001, ISO 22000, ISO 27001. We have accreditation from JAS-ANZ (Joint Accreditation System of Australia and New-Zealand) which is a member of IAF MLA

We are conducting IRCA Regd. (International Register of Certificated Auditors) Lead Auditor Training Courses for QMS, EMS & OHSAS in India and Middle East.

AINDT (Government of Australia) – Australian Institute for Non Destructive Testing accredited with Jas-Anz for Level I, Level II, Level III for Magnetic particle inspection, dye penetrant testing, ultrasonic testing, radiographic testing and vibration testing representing exclusively in India and Middle East.
